name: Hotspots 12
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@12/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign width = section.settings.width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius
  assign background_style = section.settings.background_style

  assign carousel_unfolded_desktop = section.settings.carousel_unfolded_desktop

  assign loading_attribute = 'eager'
  if lazy
    assign loading_attribute = 'lazy'
  endif

  assign image = section.settings.image
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius

  if image_ratio == "portrait"
    assign aspect_ratio = 9.6 | divided_by: 13
    assign hotspot_calculated_width = 600
    assign hotspot_calculated_height = 600 | divided_by: aspect_ratio | round
  elsif image_ratio == "landscape"
    assign aspect_ratio = 12 | divided_by: 8
    assign hotspot_calculated_width = 600
    assign hotspot_calculated_height = 600 | divided_by: aspect_ratio | round
  elsif image_ratio == "square"
    assign hotspot_calculated_width = 600
    assign hotspot_calculated_height = 600
  else
    # For original ratio, use the actual image dimensions or fall back to a default
    assign hotspot_calculated_width = image.width | default: 600
    assign hotspot_calculated_height = image.height | default: 400
  endif

  capture hotspot_sizes
    echo "(min-width: " | append: content_width | append: "px) " | append: content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 | append: "px, "
    echo "(min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), "
    echo "calc((100vw - 50px) / 2)"
  endcapture

  assign hotspot_size = section.settings.hotspot_size
  assign hotspot_size_mobile = section.settings.hotspot_size_mobile
  assign hotspot_bg_color = section.settings.hotspot_bg_color
  assign hotspot_bg_dot_color = section.settings.hotspot_bg_dot_color
  assign hotspot_bg_dot_active_color = section.settings.hotspot_bg_dot_active_color
  assign hotspot_number_radius = section.settings.hotspot_number_radius
  assign pulse_animation = section.settings.pulse_animation

  assign item_align = section.settings.item_align
  assign item_align_mobile = section.settings.item_align_mobile

  assign item_horizontal_align = ""
  if item_align == "center"
    assign item_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif item_align == "right"
    assign item_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign item_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign item_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if item_align_mobile == "center"
    assign item_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif item_align_mobile == "right"
    assign item_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign item_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign hotspot_border_thickness = section.settings.hotspot_border_thickness
  assign hotspot_border_color = section.settings.hotspot_border_color

  assign product_image_ratio = section.settings.product_image_ratio
  assign product_image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.product_image_ratio_mobile
  assign product_image_border_thickness = section.settings.product_image_border_thickness
  assign product_image_border_color = section.settings.product_image_border_color
  assign product_image_radius = section.settings.product_image_radius

  if product_image_ratio == "portrait"
    assign aspect_ratio = 9.6 | divided_by: 13
    assign calculated_width = 600
    assign calculated_height = 600 | divided_by: aspect_ratio | round
  elsif product_image_ratio == "landscape"
    assign aspect_ratio = 12 | divided_by: 8
    assign calculated_width = 600
    assign calculated_height = 600 | divided_by: aspect_ratio | round
  elsif product_image_ratio == "square"
    assign calculated_width = 600
    assign calculated_height = 600
  else
    # For original ratio, use the actual image dimensions or fall back to a default
    assign calculated_width = 700
    assign calculated_height = 400
  endif

  capture sizes
    echo "(min-width: " | append: content_width | append: "px) " | append: content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 | append: "px, "
    echo "(min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), "
    echo "calc((100vw - 50px) / 2)"
  endcapture

  assign number_size = section.settings.number_size
  assign number_size_mobile = section.settings.number_size_mobile
  assign number_custom = section.settings.number_custom
  assign number_font = section.settings.number_font
  assign number_mt = section.settings.number_mt
  assign number_mt_mobile = section.settings.number_mt_mobile
  assign number_height = section.settings.number_height
  assign number_color = section.settings.number_color

  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color

  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color

  assign price_size_mobile = section.settings.price_size_mobile
  assign price_size = section.settings.price_size
  assign price_color = section.settings.price_color
  assign price_original_color = section.settings.price_original_color
  assign price_custom = section.settings.price_custom
  assign price_font = section.settings.price_font
  assign price_height = section.settings.price_height
  assign price_compare = section.settings.price_compare
  assign price_mt = section.settings.price_mt
  assign price_mt_mobile = section.settings.price_mt_mobile

  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color

  assign modal_vertical_position = section.settings.modal_vertical_position
  assign modal_horizontal_position = section.settings.modal_horizontal_position
  assign modal_radius = section.settings.modal_radius
  assign modal_border_thickness = section.settings.modal_border_thickness
  assign modal_padding_horizontal = section.settings.modal_padding_horizontal
  assign modal_width = section.settings.modal_width
  assign modal_overlay = section.settings.modal_overlay
  assign modal_border_color = section.settings.modal_border_color
  assign modal_bg_color = section.settings.modal_bg_color
  assign close_color = section.settings.close_color

  assign colors_type = section.settings.colors_type
  assign basic_border_color = section.settings.basic_border_color
  assign accent_color = section.settings.accent_color
  assign secondary_color = section.settings.secondary_color
  assign primary_color = section.settings.primary_color
-%}

{%- style -%}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .hotspot-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0 auto;
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 600px;
    transform: translate(0);
    transition: transform .7s 
    cubic-bezier(0, 0, .09, 1);
  }

  .hotspot-image-{{ section.id }} {
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ basic_border_color }};
    {% else %}
      border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    {% endif %}
   
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;    
  }

  .hotspot-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .hotspot-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .hotspot-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .hotspot-item-dot-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: {{ hotspot_number_radius | times: 0.5 }}%;
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      background-color: #ffffff66;
    {% else %}
      background-color: {{ hotspot_bg_color }};
    {% endif %}
    width: {{ hotspot_size_mobile | times: 2 }}px;
    height: {{ hotspot_size_mobile | times: 2 }}px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .hotspot-item-dot-{{ section.id }}:before {
    content: '';
    display: block;
    width: {{ hotspot_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ hotspot_size_mobile }}px;
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      background-color: {{ accent_color }};
    {% else %}
      background-color: {{ hotspot_bg_dot_color }};
    {% endif %}   
    border-radius: {{ hotspot_number_radius | times: 0.5 }}%;
    transition: background-color .1s;
  }

  .hotspot-item-dot-{{ section.id }}.active:before {
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      background-color: {{ accent_color }};
    {% else %}
      background-color: {{ hotspot_bg_dot_active_color }};
    {% endif %}   
  }

  .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    max-width: 0;
    transition: opacity .7s cubic-bezier(0, 0, .09, 1), max-width .7s cubic-bezier(0, 0, .09, 1);
    width: 100%;
    opacity: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .hotspot-product-slide-image-container-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      border: {{ product_image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ basic_border_color }};
    {% else %}
      border: {{ product_image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ product_image_border_color }};
    {% endif %}  
    overflow: hidden;    
  }

  .hotspot-product-slide-content-container-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ item_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    transform: translateY(calc({{ text_size_mobile }}px));
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .product-slide-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active .hotspot-product-slide-content-container-{{ section.id }} {
    transform: translateY(0px);
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .hotspot-product-slide-image-container-{{ section.id }} img,
  .hotspot-product-slide-image-container-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .hotspot-product-slide-image-container-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} .hotspot-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-slide {    
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      border-bottom: {{ hotspot_border_thickness }}px solid {{ basic_border_color }};
    {% else %}
      border-bottom: {{ hotspot_border_thickness }}px solid {{ hotspot_border_color }};
    {% endif %}  
  }

  .hotspot-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-slide {
    padding-bottom: 24px;
  }

  .hotspot-product-slide-index-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ number_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ number_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ number_height }}%;
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      color: {{ primary_color }};
    {% else %}
      color: {{ number_color }};
    {% endif %}      
  }

  .hotspot-product-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      color: {{ primary_color }};
    {% else %}
      color: {{ title_color }};
    {% endif %}   
  }

  .hotspot-product-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .hotspot-product-slide-content-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      color: {{ primary_color }};
    {% else %}
      color: {{ text_color }};
    {% endif %}   
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .hotspot-product-price-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ price_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 5px;
  }

  .hotspot-product-price-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile }}px;
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      color: {{ primary_color }};
    {% else %}
      color: {{ price_color }};
    {% endif %}       
    line-height: {{ price_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-style: normal;
  }

  .hotspot-compare-price-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0.8;
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      color: {{ primary_color }};
    {% else %}
      color: {{ price_original_color }};
    {% endif %}
    text-decoration: line-through !important;
  }

  .hotspot-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    gap: 15px;
    padding-bottom: 15px !important;
  }

  .hotspot-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
  .hotspot-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    cursor: pointer;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 0;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}%;
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ basic_border_color }};
      background: {{ secondary_color }};
    {% else %}
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    {% endif %}      
  }

  .hotspot-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .hotspot-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .hotspot-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon path,
  .hotspot-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon path {
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;    
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      fill: {{ primary_color }};
    {% else %}
      fill: {{ arrow_color }};
    {% endif %}   
  }

  .hotspot-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .hotspot-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0;
  }

  .hotspot-modal-popup-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100vw;
    height: 100%;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    position: fixed;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: {{ modal_horizontal_position }};
    align-items: {{ modal_vertical_position }};
    overflow-y: scroll;
    pointer-events: none;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, {{ modal_overlay | times: 0.01 }});
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity .4s ease-in-out;
  }

  .hotspot-modal-popup-{{ section.id }}.active {
    pointer-events: all;
    opacity: 1;
    z-index: 100;
  }

  .hotspot-modal-popup-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height: fit-content;
    max-width: {{ modal_width }}%;
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      border: {{ modal_border_thickness }}px solid {{ basic_border_color }};
      background-color: {{ secondary_color }};
    {% else %}
      border: {{ modal_border_thickness }}px solid {{ modal_border_color }};
      background-color: {{ modal_bg_color }};
    {% endif %}     
    border-radius: {{ modal_radius }}px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .hotspot-modal-popup-inner-{{ section.id }} .hotspot-product-slide-content-container-{{ section.id }},
  .hotspot-modal-popup-inner-{{ section.id }} .hotspot-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: 0 {{ modal_padding_horizontal }}px;
  }

  .hotspot-modal-popup-{{ section.id }} .hotspot-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .hotspot-modal-popup-close-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 10px;
    right: 8px;
    z-index: 1;
    box-shadow: none;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .hotspot-modal-popup-close-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 24px;
    height: 24px;
  }

  .hotspot-modal-popup-close-{{ section.id }} svg path {   
    {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
      fill: {{ primary_color }};
    {% else %}
      fill: {{ close_color }};
    {% endif %}     
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .hotspot-item-dot-{{ section.id }}:before {
      width: {{ hotspot_size }}px;
      height: {{ hotspot_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspot-item-dot-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ hotspot_size | times: 2.75 }}px;
      height: {{ hotspot_size | times: 2.75 }}px;
    }

    .hotspot-product-slide-content-container-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ item_horizontal_align }};
      transform: translateY(calc({{ text_size }}px));
    }

    .hotspot-item-dot-{{ section.id }}.active-mobile:before {
      background-color: {{ hotspot_bg_dot_color }};
    }

    {% if carousel_unfolded_desktop %}
      .hotspot-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }} .hotspot-item-dot-{{ section.id }}:first-of-type {
        {% if colors_type == 'basic' %}
          background-color: {{ accent_color }};
        {% else %}
          background-color: {{ hotspot_bg_dot_active_color }};
        {% endif %}
      }
    {% endif %}

    .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block;
    }

    .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block;
      {% if carousel_unfolded_desktop %}
        max-width: 40%;
        opacity: 1;
      {% endif %}
    }

    .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}.active {
      max-width: 40%;
      opacity: 1;
    }

    .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}.active + .hotspot-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      transform: translate(-40%);
    }

    {% if carousel_unfolded_desktop %}
      .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} + .hotspot-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
        transform: translate(-40%);
      }
    {% endif %}

    .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} .hotspot-product-slide-image-container-{{ section.id }} {
      opacity: 0;
      transition: opacity .7s;
    }

    .swiper.hotspot-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      padding-right: 40%;
    }

    .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} .swiper-slide-active .hotspot-product-slide-image-container-{{ section.id }} {
      opacity: 1;
    }

    .hotspot-product-slide-content-container-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ item_horizontal_align }}
    }

    .hotspot-product-slide-index-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ number_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ number_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspot-product-slide-image-container-{{ section.id }} {
      border-radius: {{ product_image_radius }}px;
    }

    .hotspot-product-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspot-product-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
      max-height: 0;
      overflow: hidden;
      padding-left: 0;
      padding-right: 0;
      transition: max-height .7s;
    }

    .hotspot-product-slide-content-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspot-product-price-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ price_mt }}px;
    }

    .hotspot-product-price-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ price_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}.active .swiper-slide-active .hotspot-product-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
      max-height: none;
    }

    .hotspot-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-slide {
      height: auto;
    }

    .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} .hotspot-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-slide {
      opacity: 0.5;
    }

    .hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} .hotspot-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-slide-active {
      opacity: 1;
    }

    .hotspot-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: 60px;
    }

    .hotspot-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
    .hotspot-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspot-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
    .hotspot-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;       
    }

    .hotspot-modal-popup-{{ section.id }} .hotspot-product-slide-image-container-{{ section.id }} img,
    .hotspot-modal-popup-{{ section.id }} .hotspot-product-slide-image-container-{{ section.id }} svg {
      max-height: 70vh;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% if width == 'custom' %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif width == 'page' %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: clamp(100px, var(--page-content-width, var(--page-width)), 100%);
    }

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@12/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initHotspots12{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }}() {
    if (typeof Swiper === 'undefined') return;

    new Swiper('.hotspot-slider-{{ section.id }}', {
      slidesPerView: 1,
      spaceBetween: 16,
      breakpoints: {
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: 60,
          slidesPerView: 1,
        },
      },
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.hotspot-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.hotspot-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
    });

    initHotspots{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }}();
  }

  function initHotspots{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }}() {
    const hotspots = document.querySelectorAll('.hotspot-item-dot-{{ section.id }}');
    const sliderWrapper = document.querySelector('.hotspot-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}');
    const popup = document.querySelector('.hotspot-modal-popup-{{ section.id }}');
    const close = document.querySelector('.hotspot-modal-popup-close-{{ section.id }}');
    const body = document.querySelector('body');
    
    const swiperElements = document.querySelectorAll('.hotspot-slider-{{ section.id }}');
    const swiperInstances = Array.from(swiperElements)
    .map(el => el.swiper)
    .filter(swiper => swiper);

    const isCarouselUnfoldedDesktop = {{ section.settings.carousel_unfolded_desktop | json }};
    const isDesktop = window.innerWidth >= 1024;

    if (isCarouselUnfoldedDesktop && isDesktop) {
      sliderWrapper.classList.add('active');
      
      const firstHotspot = document.querySelector('.hotspot-item-dot-{{ section.id }}[data-slide-index="0"]');
      if (firstHotspot) {
        firstHotspot.classList.add('active');
      }

      if (swiperInstances.length > 0) {
        swiperInstances.forEach((slider) => {
          slider.slideTo(0);
        });
      }
    }

    hotspots.forEach((hotspot) => {
      hotspot.addEventListener('click', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth < 1024) {
          popup.classList.add('active');
          body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
          hotspots.forEach(h => h.classList.remove('active'));
          this.classList.add('active-mobile');
        } else {
          hotspots.forEach(h => h.classList.remove('active'));
          this.classList.add('active');
        }

        sliderWrapper.classList.add('active');

        const slideIndex = parseInt(this.getAttribute('data-slide-index'));
        
        if (swiperInstances.length > 0 && !isNaN(slideIndex)) {
          swiperInstances.forEach((slider) => {
            slider.slideTo(slideIndex);
          });
        }
      });
    });

    if (swiperInstances.length > 0) {
      swiperInstances.forEach((slider) => {
        slider.on('slideChange', function() {
          const activeIndex = slider.activeIndex;
          
          hotspots.forEach(h => h.classList.remove('active'));
          
          const activeHotspot = document.querySelector(
            `.hotspot-item-dot-{{ section.id }}[data-slide-index="${activeIndex}"]`
          );
          if (activeHotspot) {
            activeHotspot.classList.add('active');
          }
        });
      })
    }

    popup.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      if (e.target === popup) {
        popup.classList.remove('active');
        body.style.overflow = 'auto';
        hotspots.forEach(h => h.classList.remove('active-mobile'));
      }
    });

    close.addEventListener('click', () => {
      popup.classList.remove('active');
      body.style.overflow = 'auto';
      hotspots.forEach(h => h.classList.remove('active-mobile'));
    });
  }


  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initHotspots12{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }});

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initHotspots12{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }});
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initHotspots12{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }});
  }
</script>
